name: Dungeon Disaster
description:
The dungeon is collapsing! Fight through it as fast as you can and kill the dungeon boss! Collect power ups and weapons before your paths are all blocked!

Controls:

Move: WASD / Left Stick

Aim: Mouse / Right Stick

Attack: Left Mouse / Triggers

PickUp: Right Mouse / Button South

Open Map: Tab / Thumbstick press

Restart: R / Button North
